column1: Local Foods////My bf and I stopped by during our weekend trip to Houston. After taking two bites of his duck confit sammie
column3: "Good choice babe." Never thought that brie would taste good with duck
column4: nor that egg salad would be so great with truffle oil (and with that pretzel bun)! Major noms. I love how they have healthy sides like kale and beets. Everything tasted so fresh. We were both thoroughly full after consuming our meal. The only thing that was a little off was the mintade--it was a little too sour.
